hibernate-mapping.query:
select otherStep from InterpretationStep otherStep join otherStep.Procedure otherProcedure join otherProcedure.Type otherProcedureType, InterpretationStep refStep join refStep.Procedure refProcedure join refProcedure.Type refProcedureType where refStep = ?
and refStep.State = 'SC'
and otherProcedure.Order = refProcedure.Order
and otherStep.State = 'SC'
and otherProcedureType in ( select elements(readingGroup.ProcedureTypes) from ReadingGroup readingGroup where refProcedureType in elements(readingGroup.ProcedureTypes) )
and ( otherStep.Scheduling.Performer.Staff is null or otherStep.Scheduling.Performer.Staff = ? )
and otherStep not in (refStep)

select otherStep from ProtocolAssignmentStep otherStep join otherStep.Procedure otherProcedure join otherProcedure.Type otherProcedureType, ProtocolAssignmentStep refStep join refStep.Procedure refProcedure join refProcedure.Type refProcedureType where refStep = ?

and otherProcedure.Order = refProcedure.Order

and otherProcedureType in ( select elements(readingGroup.ProcedureTypes) from ReadingGroup readingGroup where refProcedureType in elements(readingGroup.ProcedureTypes) )
and ( otherStep.Scheduling.Performer.Staff is null or otherStep.Scheduling.Performer.Staff = ? )
and otherStep not in (refStep)
